source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_00<tab>Konogg is still looking considerably worse for his sister's absence.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_00<tab>Konogg a l'air com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment abattu.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_01<tab>Konogg, still inconsolable following the disappearance of his sister Anogg, explains that little has changed in Komra since last you spoke. This indeed seems to be the case, as several of the same villagers who previously spoke out against the twins soon arrive to further express their disgruntlement. Among them is a man you have not seen before, who hastens to chastise Konogg for his culpability in the tragedy that led to his wife's severe injury. Your dwarven friend is visibly shaken, and dissolves into tears on the spot.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_01<tab>Ostracisé par les Gogg depuis l'assaut des androïdes, Konogg a été pris à partie sous vos yeux par des villageois à la dent par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement dure. L'un d'eux, dont la femme a été grièvement blessée durant l'attaque, est allé jusqu'à le sommer de quitter le village. Submergé par l'émotion, le jeune Nain a fondu en larmes... Faites de votre mieux pour le <var 1A 02 /var>consoler<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_02<tab>With some effort and a few gentle pats on the back, you succeed in raising Konogg's spirits somewhat. He is determined to find a way to help the man and his wife, but fears that he will have little luck determining what might improve their situation while the other villagers are so ill-disposed toward civil conversation with him. Naturally, you volunteer to make inquiries in his stead.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_02<tab>Après avoir séché ses larmes, Konogg vous a confié vouloir se racheter auprès du couple dont la femme est désormais alitée. Vous avez décidé de l'aider, en allant vous renseigner à sa place sur ledit couple. Commencez par interroger le villageois présomptueux.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_03<tab>You speak with two of the dwarves you saw previously, rightly guessing that they would have some idea of what might be of comfort to the injured parties. The answer─perhaps predictably─is alcohol, with mead being the beverage of choice.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez discuté avec un groupe de Gogg plus pessimistes les uns que les autres quant à leur avenir, et appris au passage que le couple meurtri avait une passion pour l'hydromel. Rapportez cette information à Konogg.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_04<tab>Konogg is happy enough to seize upon the idea of a gift of mead for lack of any better ones, though the two of you soon realize that, with the village's liquor stores having gone up in flames, you will need to travel to Stilltide to purchase it. His sense of duty guides Konogg to insist on making the journey himself─with you as a guide, of course.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_04<tab>Sur vos conseils, Konogg va tenter d'offrir de l'hydromel au couple en gage de compassion. Vous devrez toutefois l'accompagner à Douceonde pour en acheter, le spiritueux n'étant pas disponible à Komra. Commencez par rejoindre votre jeune ami au ponceau de la Chouette bouillie.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_05<tab>You meet Konogg outside of Komra to explain the route you will be taking to Stilltide. Despite the unfortunate circumstances surrounding it─or perhaps because of them─he seems eager to make the trip.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_05<tab>Vous vous êtes mis en route pour L'Échelle, seul moyen d'atteindre le pied de la falaise. Retrouvez Konogg à mi-chemin, au sud-est d'Amistie.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_06<tab>Konogg halts at the top of the Ladder to take in the sights. If they do not provide the enlightenment he seeks, perhaps you can.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_06<tab>Rejoignez à présent Konogg à l'Échelon supérieur.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_07<tab>At Konogg's insistence, you regale him with the tale of how you and the people of Norvrandt restored the massive device to functionality. It is unclear whether he is more inspired or intimidated by this, but in any case, he presses on.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_07<tab>Konogg a tenu à ce que vous lui racontiez comment vous avez rallié les peuples de Norvrandt pour réparer L'Échelle, un récit qui semble lui avoir mis un peu de baume au cœur. Vous avez ensuite emprunté le gigantesque monte-charge jusqu'à l'Échelon inférieur. Parlez à Konogg.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_08<tab>Fortunately, you have not provided Konogg with detailed information on the location of the Leaky Keel, so he cannot dash away the moment you alight from the Ladder. Once you confirm the direction of your destination; however, he is filled with vigor at the prospect of nearing his goal, and does just that.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_08<tab>Il vous reste encore une longue route à parcourir vers l'est avant d'atteindre Douceonde. Parlez à Konogg une fois <var 08 E905 ((arrivée)) ((arrivé)) /var> à destination.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_09<tab>You find Konogg mentally fortifying himself outside the Leaky Keel. Whether he is intimidated at the prospect of entering an establishment so far from his village or simply trying to remember how to make a polite request after so long bossing an indulgent adventurer around is anyone's guess. Fortunately, he has no cause to worry, as Theva is charmed by his earnestness and kindly brings him a bottle of her finest mead.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_09<tab>À Douceonde, vous avez rendu visite à Theva, la tenancière de La Barque trouée, et lui avez acheté une bouteille de son meilleur hydromel. Vous avez ensuite pris le chemin du retour jusqu'à Komra. Parlez à Konogg.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_10<tab>Mead in hand, Konogg takes the lead back to the village. Unable to know what kind of reception the gift will earn, you elect to take him up on his offer to join him as he delivers it.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_10<tab>Konogg va à présent tenter de faire amende honorable face au couple meurtri. Accompagnez-le et tâchez de le soutenir mentalement.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_11<tab>Konogg attempts to deliver the mead along with heartfelt sentiments, but the injured woman's husband will have none of it. His hopes of helping in some small way thoroughly dashed, Konogg flees, more distressed than ever.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_11<tab>Malgré la meilleure volonté du monde et une offrande de circonstance, Konogg a échoué à se faire pardonner, et n'a récolté qu'une énième rebuffade qui l'a poussé à s'enfuir en courant... Tâchez de le rattraper.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_12<tab>As you attempt to chase down Konogg, you come upon a discarded bottle of mead─and then the dig site chief, who tells you that he but moments ago saw Konogg fleeing toward the crater. He asks that you continue your pursuit with haste, as the dwarf is in no state to be wandering around such a dangerous location.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_12<tab>Vous avez retrouvé la bouteille d'hydromel par terre, à l'entrée du village... Au même moment, le porion nain est arrivé, et vous lui avez expliqué la situation. Il vous a dit avoir aperçu Konogg filer vers le cratère. Rendez-vous à la base militaire des Pantins, et observez les environs à l'endroit indiqué.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_13<tab>Though you travel a fair distance into the Puppets' Bunker, you see no sign of Konogg. He must have been running as fast as his tiny legs could carry him.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_13<tab>Vous avez balayé du regard l'extérieur de la base sans apercevoir Konogg. Pénétrez à l'intérieur, et observez les environs au nouvel endroit indiqué.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_14<tab>You proceed to the command room, but still have yet to find Konogg─a worrying state of affairs indeed.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_14<tab>Konogg n'était ni dans le hangar, ni dans la coursive, ni dans la salle de commandement. Continuez de le chercher au plus profond de la base.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_15<tab>Deep within the alien ship, you at last locate Konogg...communing with a mysterious orb. The Echo provides some insight into the situation, though perhaps not as much as one would like: Anogg was caught in a rockslide and tumbled to the bottom of a cliff, only for her─or something identical─to appear before Konogg when he happened upon the strange white orb you now see. This raises a variety of vital questions, but as Konogg's safety is paramount, you convince him to return to the village for the time being.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_15<tab>Vous avez finalement retrouvé Konogg. À votre grand étonnement, celui-ci se tenait comme prostré face à un grand objet sphérique blanc apparu entre-temps sur la passerelle du vaisseau extraterrestre. Votre pouvoir de l'Écho s'est déclenché, vous révélant alors une stupéfiante vérité au sujet des jumeaux<var 1D /var>: la véritable Anogg serait en réalité morte il y a longtemps en tentant de protéger son frère lors d'un ef<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dre<var 16 /var>ment souterrain, et celle que vous connaissez serait un clone, né... d'une sphère blanche. Vous avez parlé de votre vision à Konogg, qui s'est empressé de démentir<var 1D /var>: pour lui, il n'y a jamais eu qu'une seule Anogg. Quoi qu'il en soit, vous l'avez convaincu de retourner en lieu sûr. <var 08 E905 ((Parvenue)) ((Parvenu)) /var> à l'entrée des ruines mécaniques, parlez à Konogg.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_16<tab>Konogg insists that he is fine, despite being quite clearly anything but. It appears unlikely that you will get much else out of him.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_16<tab>Konogg semble avoir besoin d'un peu de temps pour se remettre de ses émotions. Laissez-le seul, et allez parler au porion nain, à Komra.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_17<tab>You report what you have seen to the dig site chief, who assures you─and himself─that Anogg is surely alive and well, and will like as not return soon enough. He asks that you keep mum on the subject of the orb until Konogg has had time to recover, that there be no further cause for panic among the villagers.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_17<tab>Vous avez raconté au porion tout ce que vous avez vu, mais il n'a pas voulu en croire un mot, vous sommant même de ne répéter cette histoire à personne... Restez-en là et guettez la suite des événements, qui s'annonce des plus incertaines...

target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_18<tab>

target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_19<tab>

target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SEQ_20<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_00<tab>/comfort Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_00<tab><var 1A 02 /var>/consoler<var 1A 01 /var> Konogg

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_01<tab>Speak with villagers that are a likely source of gossip.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_01<tab>Parler au villageois présomptueux

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_02<tab>Parler à Konogg

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Konogg again.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_03<tab>Parler à Konogg, au ponceau de la Chouette bouillie

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Konogg yet again.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_04<tab>Parler à Konogg, au sud-est d'Amistie

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Konogg at Top Rung.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_05<tab>Parler à Konogg, à l'Échelon supérieur

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_06<tab>Speak with─you guessed it─Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_06<tab>Parler à Konogg

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Konogg in Stilltide. (This time, with feeling.)
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_07<tab>Parler à Konogg, à Douceonde

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_08<tab>Speak with Konogg in Komra.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_08<tab>Parler à Konogg

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_09<tab>Speak with Konogg once more.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_09<tab>Reparler à Konogg

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_10<tab>Search for Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_10<tab>Chercher Konogg

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_11<tab>Search for Konogg in the crater.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_11<tab>Observer les environs à l'endroit indiqué, dans la base militaire des Pantins

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_12<tab>Search for Konogg in the command room.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_12<tab>Observer les environs au nouvel endroit indiqué

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_13<tab>Search for Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_13<tab>Chercher Konogg

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_14<tab>Speak with Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_14<tab>Parler à Konogg

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_15<tab>Speak with the dig site chief.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_15<tab>Parler au porion nain, à Komra

target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_16<tab>

target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_17<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_18<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_18<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_19<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_19<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_20<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_20<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_21<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_21<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_22<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_22<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_23<tab>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_TODO_23<tab>

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_001<tab>Here to see me? I appreciate it, but...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_001<tab>Vous vous faites du souci pour moi<var 1D /var>? M-merci, c'est gentil...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_002<tab>I'm afraid I don't have much to tell you. There's still no sign of Anogg, and the villagers are...well, you know how they are.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_002<tab>Je n'ai pas retrouvé Anogg... et les villageois sont toujours aussi remontés...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_003<tab>Can't blame them, really. 2P used us─she said as much─but we were the ones who allowed ourselves to be manipulated. I keep thinking about what we might have done differently...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_003<tab>2P a dit qu'elle s'était servie de nous. Du coup, l'attaque des androïdes, la destruction du village, tout ça, ce serait de notre faute...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q1_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A1_000_001<tab>It serves no one to dwell on what could have been.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A1_000_001<tab>Ça ne sert à rien de se lamenter.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A1_000_002<tab>You can't change what you've done, but you can change what you do now.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A1_000_002<tab>Ce n'est pas à moi de te répondre.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_005<tab>You're right. I have to fix this, somehow. Or at least try.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_005<tab>Vous avez raison... Dans tous les cas, il faut que je trouve un moyen de me racheter auprès des autres Gogg. N'importe lequel.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERC03954_000_006<tab>What are you lazing about here for, Konogg? Where's Anogg?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERC03954_000_006<tab>Dis donc, Konogg... t'en as pas marre de traîner tes guêtres par ici<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERA03954_000_007<tab>She's still up to no good, I bet! And run off before we could make her own up to it!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERA03954_000_007<tab>Bah alors, Anogg est pas avec toi<var 1D /var>? J'croyais que vous étiez comme cul et chemise, tous les deux<var 1D /var>? Me dis pas qu'elle a pris la tangente par peur d'assumer ce désastre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_008<tab>Don't be ridiculous! Anogg, she's...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_008<tab>N-non, c'est impossible<var 1D /var>! Je suis sûr qu'Anogg vous...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_009<tab>She's what?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_009<tab>... Oui<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_100_009<tab>Go on. Explain to us where exactly Anogg is.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_100_009<tab>T'es sûr qu'Anogg nous quoi<var 1D /var>? Vas-y, crache un peu le morceau pour voir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_010<tab>I...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_010<tab>...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_011<tab>Because I'll tell you where <var 1A 02 /var>my wife<var 1A 01 /var> is... She's at death's door because of the injuries she suffered in the attack!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_011<tab>Je sais pas si t'es au courant, mais ma femme a été grièvement blessée pendant l'attaque. Elle est clouée au lit depuis...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_100_011<tab>Even <var 1A 02 /var>if<var 1A 01 /var> she wakes, she may never make a full recovery...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_100_011<tab>Tout est parti en fumée... Y a plus d'espoir nulle part...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_012<tab>So if you know what's good for you, you'll get out of this village before I do something we'll both regret.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_012<tab>Tu sais ce qui m'énerve par-dessus tout<var 1D /var>? C'est de voir ta tête de chien battu<var 1D /var>! Garde donc tes excuses pour ceux que ça intéresse... Moi, j'veux juste que tu foutes le camp une bonne fois pour toutes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_013<tab>...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_013<tab>...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_014<tab><sob>
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_014<tab>(renifle) Beuheuheu... Tout le monde me déteste... (pleure)

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>Konogg seems in dire need of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>comfort<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>Konogg a fondu en larmes... Essayez tant bien que mal de le <var 1A 02 /var>consoler<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_050<tab>I...<sniff> I...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_050<tab>Bouhou... Je voulais pas... (renifle) C'est pas juste... (pleure)

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Konogg is openly weeping. Someone ought to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>comfort<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Konogg pleure à chaudes larmes... Essayez tant bien que mal de le <var 1A 02 /var>consoler<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_052<tab><sniff> ...Sorry. I really shouldn't be wallowing.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_052<tab>Désolé, je... je ne devrais pas me morfondre. Après tout, je suis loin d'être le plus à plaindre.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_053<tab>I wish I could do something to help...for that man and his wife, especially.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_053<tab>Ce pauvre couple dont la femme a été blessée durant l'attaque... J'aimerais pouvoir les aider.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_054<tab>But I don't know either of them well, and I doubt anyone is willing to talk to me now...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_054<tab>Mais je les connais à peine... Si seulement on pouvait au moins discuter...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q2_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A2_000_001<tab>I'll ask around for you.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A2_000_001<tab>Laisse-moi jouer les intermédiaires.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A2_000_002<tab>I'll see what I can do. But you owe me─double if anyone punches me in the face.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A2_000_002<tab>Je veux bien m'y coller, à charge de revanche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_056<tab>Really? Thank you!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_056<tab>Vous feriez ça pour moi<var 1D /var>? Oh merci, c'est trop sympa<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_057<tab>With a bit of luck, they'll open up to you. If there's anything I can do to make things better, anything at all...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_057<tab>Essayez de voir ce qui pourrait leur remonter le moral... Je suis ouvert à toute demande<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_058<tab>In the meantime, I'll find another way to make myself useful. It's not as if there's a shortage of rubble that needs clearing around here.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_058<tab>Pendant ce temps, je vais déblayer un peu la place du village, histoire de me rendre utile au clan...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_060<tab>I'm sure I can be of <var 1A 02 /var>some<var 1A 01 /var> use...somehow...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_060<tab>Je me dois d'aider les adultes à rebâtir le village. C'est la moindre des choses après ce qu'il s'est passé...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_100<tab>Look who it is. I hope you're not up to more mischief with Anogg and Konogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_100<tab>Tiens, si c'est pas <var 08 E905 ((la)) ((le)) /var> comparse des jumeaux<var 1D /var>! Qu'est-ce qu'il y a<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_101<tab>A woman with severe injuries and an angry husband... Yes, I know who you mean.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_101<tab>Ah, ce couple-là... Paraît que la femme a salement morflé... Ils méritaient pas ça, les pauvres...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_102<tab>I doubt there's much to be done, but I won't stop you from trying. Those two have always been inseparable─I don't think I've ever seen them <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> holding hands. Can't imagine how he's feeling, now that she's in such a state.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_102<tab>Eux qui nageaient dans le bonheur... Dire qu'il y a pas si longtemps, on les voyait déambuler gaiement bras dessus, bras dessous...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_103<tab>You're friends with the poor dears, aren't you?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_103<tab>Tiens, il me semble que tu les connais bien, toi, nan<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERD03954_000_104<tab>The very best of friends. And how I long for those days we drank away, without a care in the world! She always loved the mead...we all did...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERD03954_000_104<tab>Ouais... Ce sont de bons Nains. Comme nous tous, ils aiment à rire, ils aiment à boire. J'ai d'ailleurs souvent trinqué avec eux autour d'une chope d'hydromel, leur boisson préférée.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERD03954_000_105<tab><sniff> It was good mead...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERD03954_000_105<tab>J'espère que la blessure de la femme guérira, et qu'on pourra de nouveau picoler tous ensemble. Il me reste qu'à faire comme tout le monde<var 1D /var>: prier pour le retour des jours heureux...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_106<tab>...That it was. There, there.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_106<tab>Tu l'as dit, bouffi...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_110<tab>Perhaps someday we'll be able to go back to the way things used to be.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERB03954_000_110<tab>Voir le village dans cet état tellement lamentable, ça m'déprime...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERD03954_000_115<tab>No...I'll never have that kind of peace of mind again.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERD03954_000_115<tab>(soupire) Tant qu'il y a de la vie, il y a de l'espoir... je suppose...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_150<tab>They talked to you? And no one got violent?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_150<tab>Vous avez discuté avec les villageois<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce qu'ils vous ont dit<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_151<tab>Mead? I suppose we <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> dwarves, so maybe it's not such a terrible idea. <sigh> But as far as I know, none of our stores survived the attack.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_151<tab>S'ils aiment tant que ça l'hydromel, je pourrais leur en offrir une bouteille ou deux... Le problème, c'est que c'est avant tout un alcool qu'on fabrique chez soi<var 1D /var>; je ne connais personne qui en vende à Komra.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q3_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A3_000_001<tab>Down the cliff we go, then.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A3_000_001<tab>Il y a un village où on peut en trouver, mais il faut descendre la falaise.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A3_000_002<tab>We can buy more in Stilltide.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A3_000_002<tab>Le village de Douceonde, en bas de la falaise. On peut en acheter là-bas.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_153<tab>Oh! If there's some available for purchase, I'd happily spend the coin. Can you show me the way?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_153<tab>Vous en êtes <var 08 E905 ((sûre)) ((sûr)) /var><var 1D /var>? Dans ce cas, hum... J-je sais qu'on vous a déjà causé beaucoup d'ennuis, ma sœur et moi, mais... vous seriez d'accord pour m'y accompagner<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q4_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A4_000_001<tab>I could go myself.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A4_000_001<tab>Je vais y aller <var 08 E905 ((toute seule)) ((tout seul)) /var>, c'est plus prudent.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A4_000_002<tab>It's too dangerous for you out there.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A4_000_002<tab>La route est longue et dangereuse, tu devrais rester ici.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_155<tab>No! No, I insist. I've accompanied you to much more dangerous places before, and I assure you I won't be a burden. And...I need to do this.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_155<tab>Pas question<var 1D /var>! C'est à moi de me bouger pour rapporter ce cadeau. Il n'aurait aucune valeur sinon<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_156<tab>I still have a few things to tidy away before I leave, so I'll meet you at the bridge in a bit.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_156<tab>Bon, je finis de déblayer et on se retrouve à l'extérieur du village, d'accord<var 1D /var>? De préférence dans un endroit discret, disons... près du pont<var 1D /var>! À tout de suite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_200<tab>There you are! Now, if you'll show me the way?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_200<tab>Bien, je vous écoute. Comment on va à Douceonde<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_201<tab>Ah, the Ladder! I've never used it before. This will be an adventure!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_201<tab>D'abord, emprunter L'Échelle jusqu'en bas de la falaise... C'est noté<var 1D /var>! En route<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_250<tab>The view is different outside of the village. Maybe I can find the perspective I need.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_250<tab>Pfiou, ça faisait un bail que j'avais pas autant crapahuté... Enfin, il faut ce qu'il faut<var 1D /var>! Continuons<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_300<tab>It's massive! How in the world did you get this moving?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_300<tab>Ouah... C'est une fois sur place qu'on se rend vraiment compte que L'Échelle est monumentale<var 1D /var>! Comment diable avez-vous réussi à mettre en marche une machine aussi monstrueuse<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q5_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A5_000_001<tab>With a great deal of help.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A5_000_001<tab>On y est parvenus grâce aux efforts combinés de plein de gens.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A5_000_002<tab>I don't quite understand it myself. Luckily, I have people for that.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A5_000_002<tab>On y est parvenus grâce à un cocktail de volonté, d'huile de coude et de talent.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_302<tab>Well, go on! Tell me all about it!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_302<tab>Hmm, hmm. Dites-m'en plus, ça m'intéresse<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_303<tab>I had no idea all of that happened in Eulmore! And the Talos...marvelous!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_303<tab>Eh ben, il s'en est passé, des choses, avant que vous ne débarquiez à Komra. L'incident d'Eulmore, la remise à neuf des talos... et le ralliement de tout Norvrandt, rien que ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_304<tab>I wish I had your ability to bring out the best in people. Maybe then Komra wouldn't be...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_304<tab>Comme quoi, on peut surmonter les obstacles en fédérant du monde. Si seulement j'avais, comme vous, le courage de prendre les problèmes à bras-le-corps, tout pourrait s'arranger à Komra...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_305<tab>Never mind. I thank you for your enlightening tale. And now...we descend!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_305<tab>C'était un récit inspirant en tout cas, merci. À présent, montons à bord de cette belle machine que vous et les gens d'en bas avez ressuscitée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_350<tab>Far be it from me to complain after having insisted upon accompanying you, but...are we there yet?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_350<tab>Dites, c'est encore loin, Douceonde<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_351<tab>Eastward it is, then.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_351<tab>C'est tout à l'est<var 1D /var>!? Mais on en vient, de l'est... Bon, c'est pas grave, allons-y<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_400<tab>Deep breaths, Konogg. Just act natural. Confident. You can do this. ...Yaaah!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_400<tab>“La Barque trouée”... Ça sonne comme un nom de bistrot, ça<var 1D /var>! Allons voir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_401<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Good to see you.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_401<tab>Oh, <var 08 E905 ((une revenante)) ((un revenant)) /var>. Ça fait plaisir de te revoir... même si je parie que tu n'es pas là pour consommer.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_402<tab>Who's your friend? He seems...eager.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_402<tab>Au moins, tu m'as amené un nouveau client... et un Nain qui plus est, c'est rare.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_403<tab>L-Lali-ho! I would like some mead! Please! Ma'am!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_403<tab>L-lali-ho<var 1D /var>! Je cherche à me procurer de l'hydromel. L'étrang... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> m'a dit que je pourrais en trouver dans ce village.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_404<tab>Well, I can't say “no” to one who asks so nicely...and any friend of <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s is welcome here. I'll bring out our finest.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_404<tab>Eh bien, j'ai des bouteilles qui feraient l'affaire, mais vu qu'il s'agit d'un ami à toi, je vais plutôt vous dégoter ce que j'ai de meilleur. Ne bougez pas.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_405<tab>Did you see? I did it! Ah, it feels so good to be working toward a goal again...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_405<tab>Je ne regrette pas d'avoir fait tout ce chemin<var 1D /var>! Avec ça, je vais pouvoir aller toquer chez le villageois et sa femme l'esprit serein.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_406<tab>Here we are.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_THEVA_000_406<tab>Cette bouteille-là, ça te va<var 1D /var>? Je ne connais pas trop les goûts des Nains...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_407<tab>Thank you, ma'am! I think this should be sufficient payment...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_407<tab>C'est parfait<var 1D /var>! Voilà pour le paiement.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_408<tab>Let's hurry back. As exhilarating as this adventure has been, I want to make a gift of the mead right away.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_408<tab>Mission accomplie, on rentre à Komra<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_450<tab>Would you like to come with me? When I deliver the mead, I mean.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_450<tab>Maintenant qu'on y est, je me demande si mon cadeau sera bien reçu... J-j'ai un peu le trac, vous pouvez rester avec moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q6_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q6_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A6_000_001<tab>Someone has to look out for you.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A6_000_001<tab>Si ça peut te faire plaisir...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A6_000_002<tab>Of course I will.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A6_000_002<tab>Bien sûr, je te suis jusqu'au bout.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_452<tab>I appreciate it. I admit that I'm a bit nervous... But this is my chance to help, if only in a small way, so I have to take it.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_452<tab>Promis, j'arrête de vous embêter après ça<var 1D /var>! Allez, je me lance. Souhaitez-moi bonne chance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_500<tab>Excuse us! We, um...we wanted to offer our best wishes. And...my sincere apology, as well.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_500<tab>Ahem... P-pardon de vous déranger, c'est moi, Konogg<var 1D /var>! Je sais que vous n'avez pas envie de me voir, mais je... je tenais à m'excuser en personne auprès de votre épouse...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_501<tab>I know it doesn't come close to making up for what you've been through, but I brought you this. I thought that maybe you could share it...later...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_501<tab>Ça... et je vous ai apporté une bouteille d'hydromel<var 1D /var>! Je me disais que vous pourriez la déboucher une fois qu'elle sera remise de sa blessure...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_502<tab>...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_502<tab>...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_503<tab>Go away. We don't want anything from you.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_503<tab>... On n'en veut pas, de ton hydromel.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_504<tab>...Oh.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_504<tab>Oh... Je vois...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_505<tab>All I <var 1A 02 /var>want<var 1A 01 /var> is for you to <var 1A 02 /var>sod off<var 1A 01 /var> so that me and my wife never have to see you again!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_VILLAGERG03954_000_505<tab>On n'attend rien de toi. Ou alors si, que tu débarrasses le plancher. Comme ça au moins, ma femme arrêtera de repenser à cette horrible journée chaque fois qu'elle voit ta tête.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_506<tab>I'm sorry...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_506<tab>...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_507<tab>Konogg sounded to be in considerable distress. You had best follow him lest he come to harm.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_507<tab>Konogg est parti en courant... Vous feriez bien de le rattraper.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_550<tab>The bottle of mead that Konogg had so earnestly wished would cheer the unfortunate couple now lies forlorn.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_550<tab>C'est la bouteille d'hydromel que Konogg comptait offrir...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_551<tab>(-???-)Lali-we've got another situation in our beards-ho!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_551<tab>(-???-)Psst, l'<var 08 E905 ((étrangère)) ((étranger)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_552<tab>Konogg just ran right past me toward the crater. I don't know about you, but I'd really rather not have him there by himself─especially not when he's so upset. I could hear the sobs from yalms away...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_552<tab>J'étais en train de rentrer tran<var 16 /var>quil<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment au village quand j'ai vu Konogg foncer à toute berzingue...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_553<tab>What's that all about?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_553<tab>Il s'est passé un truc<var 1D /var>? Il avait l'air d'en avoir gros sur la patate...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q7_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q7_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A7_000_001<tab>There's this injured woman...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A7_000_001<tab>Il est allé présenter ses excuses à un couple du village, mais ça s'est mal passé...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A7_000_002<tab>The villagers still blame him for all of it...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A7_000_002<tab>Il s'est fait houspiller par un villageois dont la femme a été blessée durant l'attaque...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_555<tab>Hmm... It's a tragic state of affairs all around.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_555<tab>Aïe... Dur pour lui...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_556<tab>The man you met─his wife was with child before her injury. Can't blame him for lashing out, given the circumstances.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_556<tab>Hmm... Je sais pas si je devrais te confier ça, mais ce couple dont tu me parles... j'crois bien qu'il attendait un môme. Il a fallu que l'attaque survienne au pire moment...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_557<tab>But that doesn't mean Konogg deserves to take the brunt of it all.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_557<tab>Reste que c'est un peu fort de café de rejeter toute la faute sur le petiot...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_558<tab>I'd consider it a personal favor if you'd find him and tell him so. ...<var 1A 02 /var>Another<var 1A 01 /var> personal favor, at any rate.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_558<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, je suis pas vraiment en position de le consoler... Mais toi, si. Rattrape-le, s'il te plaît.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_559<tab>He's not the most athletic dwarf I've ever met, so with any luck he won't have gotten far while we've been talking.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_559<tab>Je l'ai vu se diriger vers le cratère<var 1D /var>; il a pas dû aller très loin. Essaye de grimper bien haut et de jeter un œil aux alentours, tu devrais l'apercevoir.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_560<tab>I'll go and have a word with certain folks in the village. See if we can't repair some of the damage that's been done.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_560<tab>Moi, il faut que je reste au chevet du village. Enfin, de ce qu'il en reste...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_565<tab>I've never seen Konogg so worked up. I hope he's all right...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_565<tab>J'avais jamais vu Konogg à ce point tourneboulé. J'espère qu'il s'en remettra...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_600<tab>You find no sign of the dwarf you seek─a state of affairs that you are becoming all too familiar with.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_600<tab>Konogg n'a pas l'air d'être dans les parages. Continuez d'avancer.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_650<tab>You've still to see so much as a wisp of beard disappearing round the corner. Konogg must be further down.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_SYSTEM_000_650<tab>Konogg n'est pas ici non plus. Peut-être s'est-il enfoncé encore plus pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment dans la Base<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_700<tab>A-Anogg...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_700<tab>Anogg...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_701<tab>Anogg! Look over here!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_701<tab>Anogg<var 1D /var>! Par ici, dépêche-toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_702<tab>Don't run off, Konogg! It's dangerous. Let your big sister take the lead.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_702<tab>Konogg, arrête de foncer à l'aveuglette<var 1D /var>! C'est dangereux, y a souvent des éboulements dans ces galeries<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_703<tab>Waugh!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_703<tab>Aah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_704<tab>Wicked white! Konogg, move!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_704<tab>Ouah... Ça va s'effondrer<var 1D /var>! Dégage de là, vite<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_100_705<tab>A-Anogg? Anogg! Are you down there? I'm coming!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_100_705<tab>Oh non... L'éboulement l'a emportée au fond du gouffre<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... I-il faut que je descende la chercher<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_705<tab>Anogg! Answer me!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_705<tab>Anogg<var 1D /var>! Où es-tu<var 1D /var>? Réponds-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_706<tab>No...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_706<tab>Non... C'est pas possible...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_100_707<tab>A-Anogg...? Are you behind this...thing?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_100_707<tab>Qu'est-ce que...<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_707<tab>Anogg, please! Say something!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_707<tab>Anogg, c'est plus drôle<var 1D /var>! Si tu es là, réponds-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_708<tab>(-White Orb-)○! ※×□＃◇×○!
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_708<tab>(-Sphère blanche-)○！※×□＃◇×○！

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_709<tab>Wh-What?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_709<tab>Ouah<var 1D /var>! Qu-qui va là<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_710<tab>(-Dwarf Facsimile-)◇! ○※□×※▽○!
TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_711<tab>Anogg! It's you...isn't it?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_711<tab>Anogg, c'est toi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_712<tab>(-Dwarf Facsimile-)Ko...nogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_ANOGG_000_712<tab>(-Clone-)Ko... nogg...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q8_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q8_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A8_000_001<tab>That thing from the orb can't be Anogg. I'm sorry.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A8_000_001<tab>L'Anogg qu'on connaît est née de cette sphère blanche<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A8_000_002<tab>Konogg... I think Anogg may be...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A8_000_002<tab>Alors la véritable Anogg est morte depuis longtemps<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_714<tab>How do you know? How did you even know about back when she─
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_714<tab>C-comment savez-vous pour...<var 1D /var>!?<var 1D /var>... Oh, et puis, peu importe. Ça change rien en fin de compte.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_715<tab>Never mind. It doesn't matter. <var 1A 02 /var>Anogg<var 1A 01 /var> is what matters. Anogg, she...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_715<tab>Pour moi, il y a jamais eu qu'une Anogg. Ma chère sœur. Ma seule famille...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q9_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q9_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A9_000_001<tab>I know. But you can't stay here.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A9_000_001<tab>On ferait mieux de partir d'ici.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A9_000_002<tab>Let's go home and take some time to think, all right?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A9_000_002<tab>Retournons en lieu sûr, d'accord<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_717<tab>Fine...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_717<tab>D-d'accord... Je vous suis...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_750<tab>Sorry... I'm fine. Everything's fine.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_750<tab>Désolé pour tout à l'heure... J'étais un peu chamboulé, mais ça va mieux maintenant. Dites au porion qu'il a pas à s'en faire pour moi.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_755<tab>I just...need to be by myself for a while.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_KONOGG_000_755<tab>Ça vous dérange si je reste ici<var 1D /var>? J'ai besoin de me remettre les idées en place...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_800<tab>Tell me you found him.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_800<tab>Alors t'as pu nous ramener le p'tit. Me voilà rassuré.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_801<tab>What's the matter?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_801<tab>Tu tires une de ces têtes... Il s'est passé un truc avec Konogg<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q10_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_Q10_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A10_000_001<tab>I'm afraid something has happened to Anogg...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A10_000_001<tab>J'ai découvert la vérité sur sa sœur...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A10_000_002<tab>I don't know what I saw, but...
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_A10_000_002<tab>Il est allé retrouver sa sœur... ou plutôt, son “œuf”...

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_803<tab>...She fell from a cliff, you say? And then when she reappeared from this “orb” there wasn't a scratch on her?
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_803<tab>Attends un peu, c'est quoi, ces foutaises<var 1D /var>? Anogg serait morte depuis longtemps, et c'est un clone sorti d'une boule blanche qui l'aurait remplacée<var 1D /var>? On nage en plein délire, là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_804<tab>I admit that sounds bad. But I found those two in these very tunnels myself, years ago.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_804<tab>Tu me la feras pas. Les jumeaux... c'est moi qui les ai recueillis. Un beau jour, j'suis tombé sur eux par hasard au fond d'une galerie... Deux pauv' orphelins livrés à eux-mêmes.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_805<tab>They were a pair of troublemakers since the start, and they've always been a little strange, to be sure. They have good hearts, though─both of them.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_805<tab>Depuis, je les ai vus grandir. Alors oui, ils sont turbulents, oui, ils ont fait pas mal de conneries. Mais ça reste des gamins ordinaires, ça, j'en suis persuadé. Alors va pas me raconter des trucs bizarres sur eux.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_806<tab>Anogg's too headstrong to let a little tumble keep her down. And I'm certain she'll be back with us before you know it.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_806<tab>Écoute. Je sais pas exactement ce qui s'est passé là-bas, mais garde tout ça pour toi, d'accord<var 1D /var>? Les villageois sont déjà assez perturbés comme ça, ils ont pas besoin qu'on les bassine en plus avec des histoires à coucher dehors.

source: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_807<tab>As for the orb...I haven't the slightest idea, so don't you go prodding it. And keep it quiet for now. We may not be able to keep Konogg from dashing off again later, but we can preserve the peace for now.
target: TEXT_LUCKTA401_03998_DWARFMASTER03671_000_807<tab>Konogg et toi êtes revenus sains et saufs, c'est l'essentiel. À présent, ce serait bien qu'Anogg en fasse autant... Avec un peu de chance, l'ambiance dans le village se sera détendue d'ici là...
